content: special edition plaid granny square blanket patterns *****this pattern is available for free on my website at https //www nautikrallcrochet com/blog-freepatterns/plaidgrannysquareblanket one of my favourite things to do is take a favourite pattern of mine and put a chunky spin on it i love creating these chunky yarn blankets because they re very quick to work up simple and stunning wool ease thick & quick is my favourite super chunky yarn but you can use any yarn that you prefer this blanket is an absolute joy to work up only 2 round squares that go by so fast the result is a blanket the whole family can curl up under and i ve provided 9 additional colour charts to help you find the perfect match to make this years plaid blanket pattern i had to really simplify an old favourite the winter plaid blanket pattern https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/winter-plaid-blanket this pattern is worked up using a granny square the pattern uses lion brand wool ease thick & quick super bulky yarn 106yds/170g and a 9 00mm hook pattern includes 9 additional colour charts all colours are curated by me and put together in schematics so you can get a general sense of how it ll look baby blue baby pink stormy grey highland grey buffalo plaid red buffalo plaid black outlander christmas and halloween the final blanket size was approximately 50 x 62 inches blocked patterns will include - yarn amounts/quantities - 10 yarn colours/colour legends - stitch glossary - printable pdf of blanket graphs - full colour chart of all squares and their positioning so you can make this exact colour copy - full written instruction for the granny square used - video tutorials for the granny square as well as the slip_stitch join - written pattern for border and tassels happy crocheting everyone l m ***this pattern is written in english only***
